March 2020 County of Marin EMS BLS PR 3
ADMINISTRATION OF ORAL
GLUCOSE BLS PROCEDURE
Indications
• Patients with blood glucose measurement of <60
Equipment
• Oral glucose and/or juices that contain sugar (no diet drinks)
• Glucose Paste
Responsive patient with a gag reflex Lethargic patient unable to drink fluids
• Give sweetened fluids (orange/fruit • Place patient in left or right lateral
juice) to drink position
• Do not use “diet” preparations as they • Place Glucose paste 30gm PO
do not contain sugar between the dependent cheek and
• If sweetened fluids unavailable, gum
administer Glucose paste 30gm PO • Monitor airway, being prepared to
suction if necessary
Transfer care to ALS personnel as soon as possible
